story.title: The Ferrum Story
story.paragraph1: In 2025, Ferrum Insignia revolutionized the world of business signatures. Our vision: The perfect symbiosis of traditional metal craft and cutting-edge technology.
story.paragraph2: Each of our cards tells a story of excellence, innovation, and timeless elegance.

argent.title: Argent Éclat
argent.description: A brilliant silver surface that captures light and emphasizes your presence. The metallic sheen symbolizes innovation and progress.

luna.title: Luna Satin
luna.description: The gentle matte surface embodies subtle elegance and understated sophistication. A statement for those who appreciate quiet excellence.

noir.title: Noir Brilliance
noir.description: The depth of black, paired with a shimmering luster. This card embodies power and mystery in perfect harmony.

obsidian.title: Obsidian Velvet
obsidian.description: Velvety black that makes no compromises. The matte surface absorbs light and draws all attention to itself.

aurum.title: Aurum Imperial
aurum.description: The ultimate embodiment of prestige. Pure gold for those who know no boundaries. A timeless statement of the highest exclusivity.

nfc.title: NFC Integration
nfc.description: Seamless digital connectivity with a single tap.

qr.title: Smart QR
qr.description: Dynamic QR codes for flexible information sharing.

about.title: About Ferrum Insignia
about.description: Ferrum Insignia stands for perfection in detail and passion for extraordinary products. Our metallic business cards are more than just contact details - they are a statement.
